QuestData.Title: One Last Favor
QuestData.Description: Ol' Gunny doesn't have much longer...$B$BDo me one last favor, and kill the biggest, meanest fel orcs ye can find.$B$BFor old times' sake, aye?
QuestData.LogDescription: Gunny inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel wants you to kill 4 Shattered Hand Legionnaires, 2 Shattered Hand Centurions, and 2 Shattered Hand Champions.
QuestData.RewardText: If only we could have saved him.
